adjective.description: Having an extreme or irrational fear of entering open or crowded places, of leaving one's own home, or of being in places from which escape is difficult.

noun.description: A person with an extreme or irrational fear of entering open or crowded places, of leaving their own home, or of being in places from which escape is difficult.
examples: an agoraphobic who has not been out of her house for many months
